-- Generated by CSharp.lua Compiler
local System = System
local ArrayObject = System.Array(System.Object)
System.namespace("ET", function (namespace)
  namespace.class("MethodInfoHelper", function (namespace)
    local Run
    Run = function (methodInfo, obj, param)
      if methodInfo:getIsStatic() then
        local p = ArrayObject:new(#param + 1)
        p:set(0, obj)
        for i = 0, #param - 1 do
          p:set(i + 1, param:get(i))
        end
        methodInfo:Invoke(nil, p)
      else
        methodInfo:Invoke(obj, param)
      end
    end
    return {
      Run = Run,
      __metadata__ = function (out)
        return {
          methods = {
            { "Run", 0x30E, Run, System.Reflection.MethodInfo, System.Object, System.Array(System.Object) }
          },
          class = { 0xE }
        }
      end
    }
  end)
end)
